Author: artsypear
Text: my body use to do that.  i would eat cereal or fruit around 11pm and wake up still full w a lil tummy.   other days, i could eat pizza and wake up slim and very hungry. i think its just the given day?  i also tend to eat a good amount in the summer and wake up starving and noticeably thin? if that makes sense. in the winter i could do the same thing and be bloated the next morning.
